page.title: 05COURT GREEN FARM
page.content: { Farmhouses:}There are two farms in this square,one is{Court Green Farm which houses{sheep}which are at the moment ready for{shearing.}The other is{Dunsdale Farm}that hasn't got a farmhouse,but this farm houses cattle.The type of{cattle}we saw were a cross between{Charolais(male), {Hereford}and{Fresian cows(female).}The type of{sheep}were{Mashams}and{Mules which are{crossbred. { Land:}Most of the land is pasture land for{grazing.}The crops were{oil {seed rape, barley}which is used for {animal food}and{grass}for{silage.}The woodland was{coniferous}and{deciduous trees.The{scrubland}had water at the centre.There are four{pylons}in this square and some{mine shafts}that have caved in leaving holes in the fields.
